scene-visual: The statement of the Fundamental Theorem of Calculus appears on the screen.
scene-narration: The Fundamental Theorem of Calculus states that the integral of a function f over an interval [a, b] is equal to the antiderivative F of f, evaluated at b and a, and subtracted: ∫ from a to b of f(x) dx = F(b) - F(a).
